branchMenu.menuAmended: Menu amended for branch {branchId}: {changeCount} changes made.
branchMenu.menuAmendedDescription: The branch menu has been successfully amended.
branchMenu.menuViewed: Menu viewed for branch {branchId}: {itemCount} items displayed.

errors.invalidBranchIdDescription: Please provide a valid branch ID.
errors.branchNotFoundDescription: The specified branch does not exist.
errors.merchantNotFoundDescription: The specified merchant does not exist.
errors.invalidAddItemsDescription: Please provide a valid array of items to add.
errors.invalidItemNameDescription: Please provide a valid item name.
errors.invalidPriceDescription: Please provide a valid price (non-negative number).
errors.invalidCategoryIdDescription: Please provide a valid category ID.
errors.invalidUpdateItemsDescription: Please provide a valid array of items to update.
errors.invalidItemIdDescription: Please provide a valid item ID.
errors.invalidRemoveItemIdsDescription: Please provide a valid array of item IDs to remove.
errors.invalidImagesDescription: Please provide a valid array of images.
errors.invalidImageUrlDescription: Please provide a valid image URL.

menu.menuCreated: Menu created for restaurant {restaurantId}: {itemCount} items added.
menu.menuCreatedDescription: A new menu has been created.
menu.dynamicPricingApplied: Dynamic pricing ({promotionType}) applied to menu item.
menu.dynamicPricingAppliedDescription: A promotion has been applied to the menu item.
menu.pointsAwardedDescription: Points can be redeemed for rewards or menu management activities.

errors.invalidRestaurantIdDescription: Please provide a valid restaurant ID.
errors.invalidMenuIdDescription: Please provide a valid menu item ID.
errors.menuItemNotFoundDescription: The specified menu item does not exist.
errors.merchantNotFoundDescription: The specified merchant does not exist.
errors.invalidInputDescription: Please provide valid menu or promotion data.
errors.invalidItemsDescription: Please provide a valid array of menu items.
errors.invalidItemNameDescription: Please provide a valid item name.
errors.invalidPriceDescription: Please provide a valid price (non-negative number).
errors.invalidCategoriesDescription: Please provide a valid array of categories.
errors.invalidCategoryNameDescription: Please provide a valid category name.
errors.invalidPromotionDescription: Please provide valid promotion type and value.
errors.invalidPromotionTypeDescription: Please provide a valid promotion type (e.g., percentage, fixed_amount).
errors.invalidPromotionValueDescription: Please provide a valid promotion value (non-negative number).
errors.invalidStartDateDescription: Please provide a valid start date in ISO8601 format.
errors.invalidEndDateDescription: Please provide a valid end date in ISO8601 format.
errors.unauthorizedDescription: Only merchants can access menu management features.

gamification.welcome: Welcome to menu management! Earn points by creating menus, updating items, and applying promotions.
gamification.progress: Great work! You've earned {points} points so far!
gamification.progressDescription: Continue using menu management features to earn more.
gamification.milestoneDescription: Check your dashboard for new rewards.
